name: Organic Turmeric Capsules
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='280' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%23FF8C00;stop-opacity:0.8' /%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%23FF8C00;stop-opacity:0.4' /%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='280' height='200' fill='url(%23grad1)'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='60' r='20' fill='%23FF8C00' opacity='0.6'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='140' cy='100' r='25' fill='%23FF8C00' opacity='0.7'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='210' cy='70' r='18' fill='%23FF8C00' opacity='0.5'/%3E%3Ctext x='140' y='160' text-anchor='middle' fill='%232E7D32' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'%3EðŸŒ¿ Turmeric ðŸŒ¿%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: Premium organic turmeric capsules with curcumin for natural anti-inflammatory support.
usage: Take 1-2 capsules daily with meals or as directed by your healthcare provider.

name: Chamomile Dream Tea
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='280' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%23F0E68C;stop-opacity:0.8' /%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%23F0E68C;stop-opacity:0.4' /%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='280' height='200' fill='url(%23grad2)'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='60' r='20' fill='%23F0E68C' opacity='0.6'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='140' cy='100' r='25' fill='%23F0E68C' opacity='0.7'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='210' cy='70' r='18' fill='%23F0E68C' opacity='0.5'/%3E%3Ctext x='140' y='160' text-anchor='middle' fill='%232E7D32' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'%3EðŸŒ¿ Chamomile ðŸŒ¿%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: Soothing organic chamomile tea blend for relaxation and peaceful sleep.
usage: Steep 1 tea bag in hot water for 5-7 minutes. Drink 30 minutes before bedtime.

name: Ginseng Energy Powder
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='280' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='grad3' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%23CD853F;stop-opacity:0.8' /%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%23CD853F;stop-opacity:0.4' /%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='280' height='200' fill='url(%23grad3)'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='60' r='20' fill='%23CD853F' opacity='0.6'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='140' cy='100' r='25' fill='%23CD853F' opacity='0.7'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='210' cy='70' r='18' fill='%23CD853F' opacity='0.5'/%3E%3Ctext x='140' y='160' text-anchor='middle' fill='%232E7D32' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'%3EðŸŒ¿ Ginseng ðŸŒ¿%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: Pure Korean red ginseng powder for natural energy and mental clarity.
usage: Mix 1/2 teaspoon with water, juice, or smoothie. Take once daily in the morning.

name: Lavender Essential Oil
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='280' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='grad4' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%239370DB;stop-opacity:0.8' /%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%239370DB;stop-opacity:0.4' /%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='280' height='200' fill='url(%23grad4)'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='60' r='20' fill='%239370DB' opacity='0.6'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='140' cy='100' r='25' fill='%239370DB' opacity='0.7'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='210' cy='70' r='18' fill='%239370DB' opacity='0.5'/%3E%3Ctext x='140' y='160' text-anchor='middle' fill='%232E7D32' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'%3EðŸŒ¿ Lavender ðŸŒ¿%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: 100% pure therapeutic grade lavender essential oil for aromatherapy and wellness.
usage: Add 2-3 drops to diffuser or dilute with carrier oil for topical use. For sleep, apply to pillow.

name: Echinacea Immune Support
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='280' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='grad5' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%23FF69B4;stop-opacity:0.8' /%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%23FF69B4;stop-opacity:0.4' /%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='280' height='200' fill='url(%23grad5)'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='60' r='20' fill='%23FF69B4' opacity='0.6'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='140' cy='100' r='25' fill='%23FF69B4' opacity='0.7'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='210' cy='70' r='18' fill='%23FF69B4' opacity='0.5'/%3E%3Ctext x='140' y='160' text-anchor='middle' fill='%232E7D32' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'%3EðŸŒ¿ Echinacea ðŸŒ¿%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: Potent echinacea extract capsules to naturally boost immune system function.
usage: Take 1 capsule twice daily with food. Increase to 3 times daily during illness.

name: Green Tea Detox Blend
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='280' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='grad6' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%2390EE90;stop-opacity:0.8' /%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%2390EE90;stop-opacity:0.4' /%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='280' height='200' fill='url(%23grad6)'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='60' r='20' fill='%2390EE90' opacity='0.6'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='140' cy='100' r='25' fill='%2390EE90' opacity='0.7'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='210' cy='70' r='18' fill='%2390EE90' opacity='0.5'/%3E%3Ctext x='140' y='160' text-anchor='middle' fill='%232E7D32' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'%3EðŸŒ¿ Green Tea ðŸŒ¿%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: Organic green tea blend with detoxifying herbs for natural cleansing and metabolism support.
usage: Steep 1 tea bag in hot water for 3-5 minutes. Drink 2-3 cups daily between meals.

name: Ashwagandha Stress Relief
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='280' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='grad7' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%23DEB887;stop-opacity:0.8' /%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%23DEB887;stop-opacity:0.4' /%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='280' height='200' fill='url(%23grad7)'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='60' r='20' fill='%23DEB887' opacity='0.6'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='140' cy='100' r='25' fill='%23DEB887' opacity='0.7'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='210' cy='70' r='18' fill='%23DEB887' opacity='0.5'/%3E%3Ctext x='140' y='160' text-anchor='middle' fill='%232E7D32' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'%3EðŸŒ¿ Ashwagandha ðŸŒ¿%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: Adaptogenic ashwagandha root extract for stress management and mental balance.
usage: Take 1-2 capsules daily with food, preferably in the evening for best results.

name: Peppermint Digestive Tea
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='280' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='grad8' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%2398FB98;stop-opacity:0.8' /%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%2398FB98;stop-opacity:0.4' /%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='280' height='200' fill='url(%23grad8)'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='60' r='20' fill='%2398FB98' opacity='0.6'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='140' cy='100' r='25' fill='%2398FB98' opacity='0.7'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='210' cy='70' r='18' fill='%2398FB98' opacity='0.5'/%3E%3Ctext x='140' y='160' text-anchor='middle' fill='%232E7D32' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'%3EðŸŒ¿ Peppermint ðŸŒ¿%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: Refreshing organic peppermint tea blend for digestive support and natural freshness.
usage: Steep 1 tea bag in boiling water for 3-5 minutes. Drink after meals for digestive support.
